definition: it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
from this, it can be seen that...
visible light/light in optical spectrum
ubiquitous/commonplace/found everywhere

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可见，只要初始值大于零，这个函数就能够终止。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可见当时，争效文人，争购细木家具也是时尚之一了。

sentences.english: It is not visible outside the package.
Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 单击背景图层左边的眼睛图标，这样能使它不可见。

sentences.english: Real-life details fill these books of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 真实的生活细节在这些死亡之书中随处可见。

sentences.english: There are myelinated and unmyelinated fibers in alligator's optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，视神经中可见有髓纤维和无髓纤维。

sentences.english: From the above-mentioned story we can see that Mencius mother realized the importance of environment for children's development.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，孟母深知环境对孩子成长的影响。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin, can be seen everywhere in China and is said not only very unique landscape.
sentences.chinese: 篷布，在中国不仅随处可见而且是道很独特的风景。

sentences.english: A novel UV-vis detector for high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新型的高效液相色谱紫外可见检测器。

sentences.english: The hypocenter and Atom Bomb Dome are visible at top center.
sentences.chinese: 在震源和原子弹圆顶可见顶部中心。

sentences.english: The use of hypotaxis and parataxis can be found almost everywhere in literature.
sentences.chinese: 有关形合与意合的实例在文学作品中也几乎随处可见。

sentences.english: Even the nails on the suits and the hair and beards of the soldiers are carefully detailed.
sentences.chinese: 那铠甲上最小甲钉甚至武士俑的头发胡子都丝丝可见。

sentences.english: So Yuhong was from Hui He ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 可见，虞弘是一位早期回纥族人士。

sentences.english: It is transformed into visible light image through optical correlator.
sentences.chinese: 它通过光学相关器转换成可见光图像信息。

sentences.english: Nuclear condensation or apoptotic body in the apoptotic cells were observed under transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 透射电镜下可见凋亡细胞的核固缩或凋亡小体。

definition: from this, it can be seen that...
it goes to show that/one can see
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
(not only ...) but also/moreover/in addition/furthermore
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
it could even be said
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
lit. one spot (on the leopard)/fig. one small item in a big scheme
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
not only that, but ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
thus/consequently/as a result
to make out/to see
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
